experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
desc: Developing an app in React Native for foodies to review, share, and discover restaurants
Enabled users to share restaurants and recommendations over several social media platforms including Instagram, and Twitter
Implemented real-time searching and filtering of restaurants, a feature requested by over 80% of users, using Algolia search engine
Utilized AWS Lambda to send users push notifications that update them on new social activity, increasing engagement by 30%
experiences.technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, React Native, Redux, AWS Amplify, AWS Lambda, AWS Cognito, DynamoDB

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
desc: Expanded the capabilities of MindSpore, an AI computing Framework, by implementing distributed DataFrame APIs in Python and C++
Achieved up to 80% increased speed in creating a parallelized DataFrame object from a CSV file by developing a distributed FastReadCSV API
Implemented a unit testing suite and data infrastructure that measures DataFrame API correctness and performance using Pandas Testing Library and Numpy Testing Library

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
desc: Improved speed of fetching & displaying JSON data by 15% using ASP.NET web APIs in React and refactoring 30+ SQL queries
Introduced inline email feature, now used by over 20 organizations, with React, SharePoint APIs, and C# SmtpClient class
Reduced downtime by 45% and scope for human errors by 20% by automating mass data transfer between SharePoint sites with SharePoint Online Management Shell
Leveraged PowerShell to query for data above SharePointâ€™s query threshold without increasing the limit, improving site performance by 80%
experiences.technologies: JavaScript, Java, C#,  SQL, React, ASP.Net, Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft PowerShell

experiences.title: Teacher & Operations Administrator
desc: Developed strong teaching skills by instructing over 500 students across various disciplines of mathematics
Employed interpersonal communication skills through conducting bi-weekly meetings with students and parents to raise service quality, increasing enrollment by 10% and student retention by 40%
Successfully created a reliable load distribution system during class hours to boost marking speed by 35%

projects.title: Member
desc: Developed a scalable mobile app that allows university students to access club services and allows clubs to manage their operations
Implemented GraphQL APIs in NodeJS to store data in MongoDB and support operations related to Clubs, Users, Memberships, Auth, and Permissions
Used Apollo Client to connect the front-end React Native app to the backend, hosted on an AWS EC2 instance

projects.title: Artificial Light Detection and Mapping
desc: Collaborated with a team of 4 to engineer a photometer to measure ambient light levels using an Arduino Uno, photoresistors, and proximity sensors
Wrote Arduino and Python scripts to collect and analyze data received from photometer over a 3-month period
Achieved 35% reduced net light usage and installation of dimmers + sectional lights in 15 classes by presenting collected data
